anya-e0701n0:17_9: yassa bhavanti so yeva dīghanikāya nāma hoti.]
anya-e0701n0:19_10: sattasahassakāni ca.] Suttāni yassa honti so,
anya-e0701n0:20_13: Imesu ekādasa nipātesu satta- paññāsa- pañca-
anya-e0701n0:22_0: Kathaṃ aṅgato aṅgahi nava vidhaṃ hoti? Suttaṃ, geyyaṃ,
anya-e0701n0:22_15: sakalaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ nigāthakañca suttayañca aññampi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi asaṅgahitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ taṃ veyyākaraṇanti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0701n0:22_30: ānandetiādinayappavattā sabbepi acchariya abhūtadhammapaṭisaṃyuttā suttantā abhūtadhammanti veditabbā.
anya-e0701n0:22_36: mahāpuṇṇamasuttantādayo sabbepi vedañca tuṭṭhiñca laddhā [puccha] laddhā pucchitasuttantā,
anya-e0701n0:22_39: caturāsīti dhammakkhandhasahassāni sace vitthārena kathissaṃ atipapañco bhavissati.
anya-e0701n0:22_61: Bhagavato dharamānakāle ceva pacchimakāle ca bhāsitāni.
anya-e0701n0:22_65: Tivajjañca avajjañca ñatvā vajjaṃ pahāya avajje paṭipattitvā nibbānapariyante. Diṭṭha-
anya-e0701n0:23_5: Vajjañca avajjañca ñatvā vajjaṃ pahāya avajje paṭipattitvā nibbānapariyante diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikatthe,
anya-e0701n0:23_7: yadevaṃ tāya nibbānapariyante diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikatthe sādhikāni honti.
anya-e0701n0:23_8: Teva tattha kehi appamattena pariyāpuṇitabbāni dhāretabbāni dhāretabbāni vācetabbāni sajjhāyaṃ kātabbānīti
anya-e0701n0:23_9: [iti cullaganthavaṃse piṭakattaya dīpako nāma paṭhamo paricchedo.]
anya-e0701n0:25_6: Paṭhamasaṅgāyanāyaṃ pañcasatā khīṇāsavā pañcannaṃ nikāyānaṃ nāmañca atthañca adhippāyañca yadañca byañjana sodhanañca avasesaṃ kiccaṃ kariṃsu.
anya-e0701n0:25_7: Dutiyasaṅgāyanāyaṃ sattasatā khīṇāsavā tesaṃyeva saddatthādikaṃ kiccaṃ puna kariṃsu.
anya-e0701n0:25_8: Tatiyasaṅgāyanāyaṃ sahassamattā khīṇāsavā tesaṃyeva saddatthādikaṃ kiccaṃ puna kariṃsu.
anya-e0701n0:25_9: Iccevaṃ dvesatādhikā dvesahassa khīṇāsavā mahākaccāyanaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā porāṇācariyā nāma.
anya-e0701n0:25_25: Aññataro ācariyo mahāpaccariya ganthassa aṭṭhakathaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:25_26: Aññataro ācariyo kurundi ganthassa aṭṭhakathaṃ akāsi,
anya-e0701n0:25_27: mahābuddhaghosā nāmacariyo visuddhimaggo dīghanikāyassa sumaṅgalavilāsani nāma aṭṭhakathā,
anya-e0701n0:25_33: pātimokkha saṃkhātāya mātikāya kaṅkhāvitaraṇīti visuddhi nāma aṭṭhakathā,
anya-e0701n0:25_45: Ānandonāmācariyā sattābhidhammaganthaṭṭhakathāya mūṭīkaṃ nāma ṭīkaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:25_55: dīghanikāyassa aṭṭhakathādīnaṃ catunnaṃ aṭṭhakathānaṃ līnatthappakāsani nāma ṭīkā,
anya-e0701n0:25_59: abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṭīkā līnatthavaṇṇanā nāma anuṭīkāti ime cuddasa matte ganthe akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:26_0: Dve pubbācariyānāmā cariyānirutti mañjūsaṃ nāma cullanirutti ṭīkañca mahānirutti saṅkhepañca akaṃsu.
anya-e0701n0:26_2: Dīpaṅkarasaṅkhāto vimalabuddhi nāmācariyo mukhamattadīpanī nāmakaṃ nyāsappakaraṇaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:26_3: Cullavajirabuddhi nāmācariyo atthabyākhyānaṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:27_3: Ānandācariyassa jeṭṭhasisso dhammapālo nāmācariyo saccasaṅkhepaṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:28_7: paṭisambhidāmaggaṭṭhakathā gaṇṭhi ceti ime cha ganthā mahānāmācari visuṃ visuṃ katā.
anya-e0701n0:29_0: Navo mahānāmo nāmācariyo navaṃ mahāvaṃsa nāma pakaraṇaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:29_1: Upaseno nāmācariyo saddhammapajjotikaṃ nāma mahāniddesassa aṭṭhakathaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:29_2: Moggalāno nāmācariyo moggalānabyākaraṇaṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:29_5: Vuttodayakāro nāmācariyo vuttodayaṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:29_6: Dhammasiri nāmācariyo khuddakasikkhaṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:29_9: ime dve ganthā dvehācariyehi visuṃ visuṃ katā.
anya-e0701n0:30_3: Khemo nāmācariyo khemaṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:30_4: Sāriputto nāmācariyo vinayaṭṭhakathāya sāratthadīpanī nāma ṭīkaṃ;
anya-e0701n0:30_10: Buddhanāgo nāmācariyo vinayatthamañjūsaṃ nāma kaṅkhāvitaraṇīyā ṭīkaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:30_11: Navo moggalāno nāmācariyo abhidhānappadīpikaṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:30_12: Vācissaro nāmācariyo mahāsāmi nāma subodhālaṅkārassa ṭīkā,
anya-e0701n0:31_2: Buddhapiyo nāmācariyo sāratthasaṅgahaṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:31_4: Medhaṅkaro nāmācariyo jinacaritaṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:32_20: ime vīsati ganthā vīsatācariyehi visuṃ visuṃ katā.
anya-e0701n0:33_0: Saddhammasiri nāmācariyo saddatthabhedacintā nāma pakaraṇaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:33_1: Devo nāmācariyo sumana kūṭavaṇṇanaṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:33_2: Cullabuddhaghoso nāmācariyo sotatthakinidānaṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:33_3: Raṭṭhapālo nāmācariyo madhurasaṅgāhaṇīkitti nāma pakaraṇaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:33_6: Aggavaṃso nāmācariyo saddanīti pakaraṇaṃ nāma akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:33_7: Vajirabuddhi nāmācariyo mahāṭīkaṃ nāma nyāsapakaraṇaṭīkaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:33_11: Ñāṇasāgaro nāmācariyo liṅgatthavivaraṇappakāsanaṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:33_22: koladdhajanassa sakaṭabhāsāya kataṭīkañca tividhaṃ pakaraṇaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:34_0: Aññataro ācariyo saddabindu nāma pakaraṇaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:34_1: Saddhammaguru nāmācariyo saddavuttippakāsakaṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:34_3: Aññataro ācariyo kaccāyanasāraṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ kaccāyanasārassa ṭīkañca duvidhaṃ pakaraṇaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:34_4: Navo medhaṅkaro nāmācariyo lokadīpakasāraṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:34_5: Aggapaṇḍito nāmācariyo lokuppatti nāma pakaraṇaṃ akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:34_22: māgadhabhūtāvidaggamukhamaṇḍanaṭīkā ceti ime cha ganthe akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:35_24: iccevaṃ pañcavīsati pamāṇāni pakaraṇāni laṅko dīpādīsuṭṭhānesu paṇḍitehi katāni ahesuṃ,
anya-e0701n0:35_38: gāthādikā gāthā yo paṇḍitehi laṅkādīpādisuṭṭhānesu katā ahesuṃ [iti cullaganthavaṃse ganthakārakācariya dīpako nāma dutiyo paricchedo]
anya-e0701n0:37_4: Mahākaccāyano jambudīpikācariyo so hi avantiraṭṭhe ujjenī nagare candapajjotassa nāma rañño purohito hutvā kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ disvā,
anya-e0701n0:37_5: gharāvāsaṃ pahāya satthusāsane pabbajjitvā heṭṭhā vuttappakāre ganthe akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:37_9: aññataro ācariyā dveti ime ca bhūvācariyā.
anya-e0701n0:37_10: Laṅkādīpikācariyā nāma te kira buddhaghosācariyassa pūre bhūtācariye kāle ahesuṃ.
anya-e0701n0:37_12: So kira magadharaṭṭhe ghosakagāme rañño purohitassa kesi nāma brāhmaṇassa putto,
anya-e0701n0:37_13: satthusāsane pabbajjitvā laṅkādīpaṃ gato heṭṭhā vuttappakāre ganthe akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:38_11: kassapācariyoti ime ekādasacariyā jambudīpikā heṭṭhā vuttapakāre ganthe akaṃsu.
anya-e0701n0:38_37: raṭṭhapālācariyoti ime dve paññāsācariyā laṅkādīpikācariyā nāma.
anya-e0701n0:38_57: vimalabuddhācariyoti ime tevīsati ācariyā jambudīpikā heṭṭhā vuttappakāre ganthe pukkāma saṅkhāte arimaddana nagare akaṃsu.
anya-e0701n0:39_0: Navovimalabuddhācariyo jambudīpiko heṭṭhā vuttappakāre ganthe paṃyanagare akāsi.
anya-e0701n0:39_1: Aññatarācariyo ariyavaṃsācariyoti ime dvācariyā jambudīpikā heṭṭhā vuttappakāre ganthe ati [navi] pure akaṃsu,
anya-e0701n0:39_2: aññatarā vīsatācariyā jambudīpikā heṭṭhā vuttappakāre ganthe kiñci purādighare akaṃsu.
anya-e0701n0:40_0: [Iti cullaganthavaṃse ācariyānaṃ sañjātaṭṭhāna dīpako nāma tatiyo paricchedo.]
anya-e0701n0:42_0: Ganthā pana siyā āyācanena ācariyehi katā,
anya-e0701n0:42_10: Imehi cha ganthehi attano matiyā sāsanuggahanatthāya saddhammaṭhitiyā katā.
anya-e0701n0:44_1: saṅghapālena nāma saṅghatherena āyācitena buddhaghosācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:44_2: Dīghanikāyassa aṭṭhakathā gantho dāṭhā nāmena saṅghatherena āyācitena buddhaghosācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:44_3: Majjhimanikāyassa aṭṭhakathā gantho buddhamittanāmena therena āyācitena buddhaghosācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:44_4: Saṃyuttanikāyassa aṭṭhakathā gantho jotipālena nāma therena āyācitena buddhaghosācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:44_5: Aṅguttaranikāyassa aṭṭhakathā gantho bhaddantā nāma therena sahaājīvakena upāsakena ca āyācitena buddhaghosācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:44_6: Samantapāsādikā nāma aṭṭhakathā gantho buddhasiri nāmena therena āyācitena buddhaghosācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:44_8: ganthānaṃ aṭṭhakathā gantho cullabuddhaghosena bhikkhunā āyācitena buddhaghosācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:44_9: Dhammapadassaaṭṭhakathā gantho kumārakassapanāmena therena āyācitena buddhaghosācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:44_12: buddhapiyadeva saṅkhātehi tīhi therehi āyācitena buddhaghosācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:44_14: suttanipātassa aṭṭhakathā gantho attano matiyā buddhaghosācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:44_15: Apadānassa aṭṭhakathā gantho pañcanikāya viññūhi pañcahi therehi āyācitena buddhaghosācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:47_1: vinicchayagantho attano sissena buddhasīhena nāma therena āyācitena buddhattācariyā kato. Uttara-
anya-e0701n0:47_2: vinicchayagantho saṅghapālena nāmena therena āyācitena buddhadattācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:47_3: Abhidhammāvatāro nāma gantho attano sissena sumati therena āyācitena buddhadattācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:47_4: Buddhavaṃsassa aṭṭhakathā gantho teneva buddhasīhanāma therena āyācitena buddhadattācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:49_0: Abhidhammakathāya mūlaṭīkā nāma ṭīkā gantho buddhamittā nāma therena āyācitena ānandācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:51_0: Nettipakaraṇassa aṭṭhakathā gantho dhammarakkhita nāma therena āyācitena dhammapālācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:51_8: ime satta ganthā attano matiyā dhammapālācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:51_9: Visuddhimaggaṭīkā gantho dāṭhā nāmena nāma therena āyācitena dhammapālācariyena kato,
anya-e0701n0:51_15: jātakaṭṭhakathāya ṭīkā gantho ceti ime pañca ganthā attano matiyā dhammapālācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:53_1: mahāniruttisaṅkhepo nāma gantho ca attano matiyā pubbācariyehi viṃsu kato.
anya-e0701n0:54_0: Pañca vinayapakaraṇānaṃ vinayagaṇṭhi nāma gantho attano matiyā mahāvajirabuddhācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:54_1: Nyāsasaṅkhāto mukhamattadīpanī nāma gantho attano matiyā vimalabuddhi ācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:54_2: Atthabyakkhyāno nāma gantho attano matiyā cullavajirabuddhācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:54_3: Rūpasiddhi tassa ca ganthassa ṭīkā gantho sabba pañcasuttañca attano matiyā dīpaṅkarācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:54_4: Saccasaṅkhepo nāma gantho attano matiyā culladhammapālācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:54_10: Paṭisambhidāmaggassa aṭṭhakathā gantho mahānāmena upāsakena āyācitena mahānāmācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:54_16: mahāvaṃso cāti ime cha ganthā attano matiyā mahānāmācariyehi visuṃ katā.
anya-e0701n0:54_17: Navo mahāvaṃsagantho attano matiyā cullamahānāmācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:54_18: Saddhammapajjotikā nāma mahāniddesassa aṭṭhakathā gantho devena therena āyācitena upasenācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:54_20: Subodhālaṅkāra nāma gantho attano matiyā saṅgharakkhitācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:54_21: Vuttodaya gantho attano matiyā vuttodayakārācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:54_22: Khuddasikkhā nāma gantho attano matiyā dhammasirācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:54_24: ime dve ganthe attano matiyā aññatarehi dvihācariyehi viṃsu katā.
anya-e0701n0:55_0: Paramatthavinicchayaṃ nāma gantho saṅgharakkhitena therena āyācitena anuruddhācariyena kato. Nāmarūpa-
anya-e0701n0:55_1: paricchedo nāma gantho attano matiyā anuruddhācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:55_2: Abhidhammatthasaṅgahaṃ nāma gantho namma nāmena upāsakena āyācitena anuruddhācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:55_3: Khemo nāma gantho attano matiyā khemācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:55_7: aṅguttaraṭṭhakathāya navo ṭīkā ganthoti ime cattāro ganthā parakkamabāhu nāmena laṅkādīpissarena raññā āyācitena sāriputtācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:55_8: Sakaṭasaddasatthassa pañcikāya ṭīkā gantho attano matiyā sāriputtācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:55_9: Kaṅkhāvitaraṇiyā vinayatthamañjūsā nāma ṭīkā gantho sumedhā nāmatherena āyācitena buddhanāgācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:55_10: Abhidhānappadīpiko nāma gantho attano matiyā cūlamoggalānācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:55_12: vuttodaya vivaraṇañcāti ime dve ganthā attano matiyā vācissarena katā.
anya-e0701n0:55_13: Khuddasikkhāya sumaṅgalappasādani nāma navo ṭīkā gantho sumaṅgalena āyācitena navācissarena kato.
anya-e0701n0:55_15: moggalānabyākaraṇassa ṭīkā cāti ime tayo ganthā,
anya-e0701n0:55_20: vānijjā bhātu upāsakena ca āyācitena vācissarena kato.
anya-e0701n0:55_28: paccayasaṅgaho cāti ime satta ganthā attano matiyā vācissarena katā.
anya-e0701n0:55_32: abhidhammatthasaṅgahassa ṭīkā cāti ime dve ganthā attano matiyā sumaṅgalācariyena katā.
anya-e0701n0:55_33: Sāratthasaṅgahaṃ nāma gantho attano matiyā buddhappiyena kato dantadhātuvaṇṇanā nāma pakaraṇaṃ
anya-e0701n0:56_0: Laṅkādīpissarassa rañño senāpatinā āyācitena dhammakittināmācariyena kataṃ.
anya-e0701n0:56_1: Jinacaritaṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ attano matiyā medhaṅkarācariyena kataṃ.
anya-e0701n0:56_3: jinālaṅkārassa ṭīkā attano matiyā buddharakkhitācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:56_4: Amatadharassa nāma anāgatavaṃsassa attano matiyā aṭṭhakathā upatissācariyena katā.
anya-e0701n0:56_23: ime vīsati ganthā attano matiyā vīsatācariyehi viṃsu viṃsu katā.
anya-e0701n0:57_0: Saddattha bhedacintā nāma pakaraṇaṃ attano matiyā saddhammasirināmācariyena kataṃ. Sumana-
anya-e0701n0:57_2: rāhulā nāma therena āyācitena vācissarenadevatherena kataṃ.
anya-e0701n0:57_3: Sotattha kiṃ mahānidānaṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ attano matiyā cullabuddhaghosācariyena kataṃ.
anya-e0701n0:57_4: Madhurasaṅgāhani nāma pakaraṇaṃ attano matiyā raṭṭhapālācariyena kataṃ.
anya-e0701n0:57_5: Liṅgatthavivaraṇaṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ attano matiyā subhūtacandācariyena kataṃ.
anya-e0701n0:57_7: Nyāsapakaraṇassa mahāṭīkā nāma ṭīkā attano matiyā vajirabuddhācariyena katā.
anya-e0701n0:57_9: Mukhamattasārassa ṭīkā sutasampanna nāmena dhammarājino gurunā saṅghatherena āyācitena guṇasāgarācariyena katā.
anya-e0701n0:57_10: Saddatthabhedacintāya mahāṭīkā attano matiyā abhayācariyena katā.
anya-e0701n0:57_11: Liṅgatthavivaraṇappakāsakaṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ attano matiyā ñāṇasāgarācariyena kataṃ.
anya-e0701n0:57_12: Guḷhatthassa ṭīkā bālappabodhanañca duvidhaṃ pakaraṇaṃ attano matiyā aññatarācariyena kataṃ.
anya-e0701n0:57_13: Saddatthabhedacintāya majjhimaṭīkā attano matiyā aññatarācariyena katā.
anya-e0701n0:57_15: liṅgatthavivaraṇā ṭīkā ca attano matiyā uttamācariyena katā.
anya-e0701n0:57_16: Saddatthabhedacintāya nava ṭīkā attano matiyā aññatarācariyena katā.
anya-e0701n0:57_18: bhūtā ṭīkā cāti duvidhā ṭīkāyo attano mati,
anya-e0701n0:57_19: sīhasūra nāma rañño ekena amaccena katā.
anya-e0701n0:57_20: Koladdhajanassaṭīkā pāsādikena nāma therena āyācitena teneva mahāmaccena katā.
anya-e0701n0:57_21: Kārikaṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ ñāṇagambhīranāmena bhikkhunā āyācitena dhammasenāpatācariyena kataṃ.
anya-e0701n0:57_22: Etimāsamidīpanī [vā etimāsamidīpikā] nāma pakaraṇaṃ manohārañca attano matiyā teneva dhammasenāpatācariyena kataṃ.
anya-e0701n0:57_23: Kārikāya ṭīkā attano matiyā aññatarācariyena katā.
anya-e0701n0:57_24: Etimāsamidīpikāya ṭīkā attano matiyā aññatarācariyena katā.
anya-e0701n0:58_0: Saddabindupakaraṇaṃ attano matiyā dhammarājassa gurunā aññatarācariyena kataṃ.
anya-e0701n0:58_1: Saddavuttippakāsakaṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ aññatarena bhikkhunā āyācitena saddhammaguru nāmācariyena kataṃ.
anya-e0701n0:58_2: Saddavuttippakāsakassa ṭīkā attano matiyā sāriputtācariyena katā.
anya-e0701n0:59_0: Kaccāyana sāro ca kaccāyanasārassa ṭīkā cāti duvidhaṃ pakaraṇaṃ attano matiyā aññatarācariyena kataṃ.
anya-e0701n0:59_1: Lokadīpakasāraṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ attano matiyā navenamedhaṅkarācariyena kataṃ.
anya-e0701n0:59_3: Jaṅghadāsakassa ṭīkā bhūtā magadhaṭīkā attano matiyā cīvarācariyena katā.
anya-e0701n0:59_8: paṭṭhānagaṇanānayo cāti ime pañca pakaraṇāni attano matiyā saddhammajotipālācariyena katāni.
anya-e0701n0:59_10: nāmena jambudīpissarena rañño āyācite teneva saddhammajotipālācariyena katā.
anya-e0701n0:59_11: Kaccāyanassa suttaniddeso attano sissena dhammacārinā therena āyācitena saddhammajotipālācariyena kato.
anya-e0701n0:60_3: pannarasaṭṭhānavaṇṇānaṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ attano matiyā navena-
anya-e0701n0:60_5: Saddasāratthajālinī nāma pakaraṇaṃ attano matiyā navena-
anya-e0701n0:60_9: paṃyanagare rañño gurunā saṅgharājena āyācitena teneva navena vimalabuddhācariyena katā.
anya-e0701n0:60_13: magadhabhūtavidaggamukhamaṇḍaniyāṭīkā cāti imāni cattāri pakaraṇāni attano matiyā teneva navena vimalabuddhācariyena katāni.
anya-e0701n0:61_0: Pañcapakaraṇaṭīkāya navānuṭīkā attano matiyā aññataro cariyena katā.
anya-e0701n0:61_1: Abhidhammasaṅgahassa navaṭīkā attano matiyā aññatarācariyena katā.
anya-e0701n0:61_2: Abhidhammatthasaṅgahaṭīkāya [maṇi] mañjūsā [maṇisāramañjūsā] nāma navānuṭīkā attano matiyā ariyavaṃsācariyena katā.
anya-e0701n0:62_0: Peṭakopadesassa ṭīkā attano matiyā udumbarināmācariyena pukkāmanagare katā.
anya-e0701n0:62_18: pakaraṇassa ṭīkā ca saddhammopāyano bālappabodhanaṭīkā ca,
anya-e0701n0:62_44: ticattālīsa pakaraṇāni attano matiyā sāsanassa jātiyā saddhammassa ṭhitiyā ca laṅkādīpādīsu viṃsu viṃsu katāni.
anya-e0701n0:63_2: Attano attano buddhaguṇapakāsanatthāya attano ca pare ca anantapaññāpavattanatthāya ca paṇḍitehi laṅkādīpādīsu viṃsu viṃsu katā.
anya-e0701n0:66_24: Saṅgītikāle pañcasatā khīṇāsavā tesañca dhammakkhandhānaṃ nāma vagganipātato.
anya-e0701n0:66_29: yadi nāmādikaṃ kiccaṃ akataṃ na supākataṃ tasmā vohārasukhatthāyanāmādikaṃ kiccaṃ kataṃ anāgate panatthāya
anya-e0701n0:66_30: nāmādikaṃ pavattitaṃ asañjātanāmo na suṭṭhu pākato sabbaso bhaveti.
anya-e0701n0:67_8: Saddhātissassarājino puttassa vaṭṭagāmani rājassa kāle āropitāni.
anya-e0701n0:70_0: Sabbepi te bhikkhu ādi, manasā vacasāhāro;
anya-e0701n0:73_0: Ariyānariyā cāpi ca, sabbe vācuggatā dhuvaṃ.
anya-e0701n0:75_0: Sabbe puthujjanā ceva, ariyā ca sabbepite.
anya-e0701n0:79_0: Tato paramhi rājā ca, tato cuto ca tusite.
anya-e0701n0:80_0: Uppajji deva loke so, devehi parivārito;
anya-e0701n0:81_0: Saddhā tissoti nāmena, tassa kaniṭṭhako hito.
anya-e0701n0:83_0: Tadā kāle bhikkhū āsuṃ, sabbe vācuggatā sadā;
anya-e0701n0:84_0: Nikāye pañcavedheva, yāva rañño ca dhāraṇā;
anya-e0701n0:85_0: Tato cuto so rājā ca, tussīte upapajjati;
anya-e0701n0:87_0: Tassa puttāpi ahesuṃ, anekā varajjaṃ gatā;
anya-e0701n0:91_0: Tato paraṃ potthakesu, nikāyā pañca piṭṭhitā;
anya-e0701n0:92_0: Tadā aṭṭhakathā ṭīkā, sabbe ganthā potthake gatā;
anya-e0701n0:93_0: Sabbe potthesu ye ganthā, pāḷi aṭṭhakathā ṭīkā;
anya-e0701n0:94_0: Saṃṭṭhitāsaṃ ṭhitā honti, sabbepi no na santite.
anya-e0701n0:95_0: Tadā te potthakeyeva, nikāyā piṭhitā khilā;
anya-e0701n0:102_0: Sabbepi te bhikkhū āsuṃ, bahuṃtarā puthujjanā;
anya-e0701n0:103_0: Na sakkhissanti te pañca, nikāye vācuggataṃ iti;
anya-e0701n0:106_0: Tato paṭṭhāyate sabbe, nikāyā honti potthake;
anya-e0701n0:107_0: Aṭṭhakathā ṭīkā sabbe, te honti potthakeṭṭhitā.
anya-e0701n0:108_0: Tato paṭṭhāyate sabbe, bhikkhu ādi mahāgaṇā;
anya-e0701n0:111_1: aṭṭhakathādikaṃ ganthaṃ karoti vā kārāpeti vā,
anya-e0701n0:111_8: yo ca buddhavacanamañjūsaṃ karoti vā kārāpeti vā,
anya-e0701n0:111_9: yo ca buddhavacanaṃ maṇḍanaṃ karoti vā kārāpeti vā,
anya-e0701n0:111_10: yo ca buddhavacanaṃ lekhaṃ karoti vā kārāpeti vā,
anya-e0701n0:111_14: yo ca telaṃ vā cuṇṇaṃ vā,
anya-e0701n0:111_15: dhaññaṃ vā potthakabhañjanatthāya yaṃ kiñci nitthaṃ vā potthakachidde āvunatthāya,
anya-e0701n0:111_16: yaṃ kiñci suttaṃ vā kaṭṭhaphalakadvayaṃ vā potthakaṃ puṭanatthāya yaṃ kiñci vatthaṃ vā, potthaka-
anya-e0701n0:111_18: yaṃ kiñci yottaṃ vā potthakalāpa pūṭanatthāya yaṃ kiñci thavikaṃ deti vā dāpeti vā.
anya-e0701n0:112_0: Yo ca haritālena vā manosilāya vā,
anya-e0701n0:112_1: suvaṇṇena vā rajatena vā potthakamaṇḍanaṃ vā kaṭṭhaphalakamaṇḍanaṃ vā karoti vā kārāpeti vā,
anya-e0701n0:114_0: Mahā tejo sadā hoti, sīhanādo visārado.
anya-e0701n0:121_0: Sabbe sattāpi yo loke, sabbattha pūjitābhave;
anya-e0701n0:127_0: Tasmāhi paṇḍito poso, saṃpassaṃ hita mattano;
anya-e0701n0:128_0: Kāreyya sāma ganthe ca, aññe cāpi kārāpaye.
anya-e0701n0:129_0: Potthake ca ṭhite ganthe, pāḷi aṭṭhakathādike;
anya-e0701n0:130_0: Dhammamañjūsā ganthe ca, lekhaṃ kare kārāpaye.
anya-e0701n0:133_0: Dhammabandhanatthāya ca, yaṃ kiñci mahagghaṃ vatthaṃ;
anya-e0701n0:141_0: Sohaṃ tato gantvā cimaṃ, jina navaṃ yaṃ pūraṃ;
anya-e0701n0:143_0: Sabba dhammaṃ vissejjento, kikāre neva bhikkhuno;
anya-e0701n0:144_0: Cha vassānaṃ gaṇaṃ bhitvā, kāmānaṃ abhimaddanaṃ.
anya-e0701n0:145_0: Santi sabhā ca nibbānaṃ, gavesiñca punappunaṃ;
anya-e0701n0:148_0: Iti pāmojjatthāya araññavāsinā, nandapaññācariyena kato cūḷaganthavaṃso niṭṭhito.
anya-e0701n0:149_1: yaṃ pakaraṇaṃ likkhitaṃ taṃ paripuṇṇaṃ tena puññena taṃ piṭakaṃ parisippaṃ pariniṭṭhitaṃ.
anya-e0701n0:150_0: Mameva sissasamūhānañca parisippaṃ pariniṭṭhitaṃ. Tave sissānū sissāni ca, parisippaṃ pariniṭṭhitaṃ.
